name: LaMBDa - IOS Research Data Repository
description: LaMBDa is the Research Data Portal of the Leibniz Institute for East and Southeast European Studies (IOS). It publishes research data related to Labour, Migration, and Biographical Data, assigning DOIs for persistent identification. Metadata is based on DCAT (Data Catalog Vocabulary) and Disco (DDI-RDF Discovery Vocabulary). Data access is open or restricted; upload is restricted to institutional members. Licensing includes Public Domain and CC.
owner_name: Leibniz Institute for East and Southeast European Studies (IOS)
